DOC.brief_summary: This study consist three part : 1 ) retrospective chart review patient treat mRCC July 2013 start educational intervention ; 2 ) educational program DCN community oncology provider DCN community patient mRCC , last 8 - 10 month , 3 ) second retrospective chart review patient treat mRCC start time educational intervention intervention complete .
DOC.detailed_description: The initial retrospective cohort serve pre-education control , second cohort experimental group ass efficacy educational intervention change care patient mRCC . Chart Reviews . This study begin multi-site chart review conduct Duke Cancer Network affiliate site . The chart review begin late fall , 2015 . The Duke Cancer Network team perform chart abstraction study , goal review least 60 chart patient treat July 2013 October 2015 . The second data collection period collect data patient mRCC see DCN site date fall 2015 educational intervention roll . The target least 60 chart patient treat time educational intervention actively available .
